EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_TorontoOfficeOpening_Q314.Registration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You are confirmed to attend Pivotal Toronto Grand Office Opening (October 2)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
REGISTRATION CONFIRMATION Hello {{lead.First Name:default=}},
Thank you for registering for Pivotal Toronto Grand Office Opening. See event details below.
Date: Thursday, October 2, 2014 Time: 6pm - 9pm Location: Pivotal Office, 1 Toronto St, 11th Floor, Toronto, ON. M5C 2V6
Should you have any questions or would like more information, please email elogue@pivotal.io <mailto:elogue@pivotal.io>. See you on Thursday, October 2nd!
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
